name: Project Black - Card Game
description:
A game inspired by Slay the Spire for the 103 Darkness Mini Jam. Made in about a day and a bit. May update later on too add in sound and stuff as it was a fun project to work on. Used some free graphic assets from online and the epic market place which is listed in the credits in game. 

GitHub: https://github.com/Sinpkr/Darkness_MiniJam103
